long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Adds the Maps button back to Google search pages and makes the search result map images clickable again for seamless navigation.

The "Google Search Maps Button" Chrome extension restores the Google Maps button to the Google Search navigation bar for users in Europe. If you've noticed the Google Maps button missing from your search experience, this extension is designed to fix that.

What it Does: This extension provides quick access to Google Maps with a single click from the Google Search page. It also makes map images clickable within search results, greatly enhancing your navigation experience.

Why it's Needed: Due to the Digital Markets Act (DMA), which aims to promote fair competition and innovation, the Google Maps shortcut was removed for European users. This tool effectively brings back that lost convenience.

Privacy and Security: The extension operates without saving any user data, ensuring your privacy and security are protected.

For anyone who has missed the Google Maps button in the Google Search navigation bar in Europe, this extension offers a straightforward and effective solution, seamlessly reintegrating this essential feature into your browsing routine.
